Prompts

Copy-paste prompts with purpose. No theatre, no fluff.

studylearning
Explain Like a Patient Tutor (Step-by-step + Quiz)
Turn confusing topics into something you can explain back clearly, under pressure.
devdebug
Bug Hunter (Ranked Causes + Minimal Fixes)
Debug code without random guessing disguised as confidence.
writingcommunication
Rewrite for Clarity (No Fluff, Same Meaning)
Make text sharper, shorter, and harder to misunderstand.
creatorcontentvideo
YouTube Script Generator (Hook → Value → CTA)
Generate scripts that feel watchable, not like a school presentation.
studyplanning
7-Day Study Plan (Realistic, Not Delusional)
Build a study plan that assumes you’re human and get tired.
writingreviewsseo
Product Review Brief (Balanced + Credible)
Write reviews that don’t sound like paid ads.
decisionproductivitytools
Compare Options + Pick a Winner (With Criteria)
Turn ‘which is better?’ into a clear decision with tradeoffs and a final pick.
sqldevdatabase
SQL Query Builder (Ask → Build → Explain)
Generate correct SQL from requirements, with explanations and edge cases.
copywritingseoproduct
Landing Page Copy Audit (Fix Confusing Text)
Improve website copy so users understand it in 5 seconds instead of leaving.
careerinterviewpractice
Interview Prep Coach (Questions + Answers + Follow-ups)
Practice interviews with realistic questions and strong, structured answers.
